item.description: A prhase - which I remembered last night after I drank a couple scotches No se extraña lo que nunca se ha tenido… A song A gif An image "Starry Night Over the Rhone" by 宇中蜃楼 is licensed under CC BY-SA 2.0 A book GoodReads link A movie Netflix Link
